Title: Ecstasy
Writer: Robert Horky (book), Frantisek Horký (screenplay), Jacques A. Koerpel, Gustav Machatý (screenplay)
Actors: Hedy Lamarr, Aribert Mog, Zvonimir Rogoz, Leopold Kramer
Plot: Eva has just gotten married to an older gentleman, but discovers that he is obsessed with order in his life and doesn't have much room for passion. She becomes despondent and leaves him, returning to her father's house. One day while bathing in the lake she meets a young man and they fall in love. The husband has become grief stricken at the loss of his young bride, and fate brings him together with the young lover that has taken Eva from him.
